programme.desc: In a fractured near-future America balanced on the razor's edge, a group of journalists must race through battlefields to reach the White House before D.C. falls.

programme.title: Killing Me Softly
programme.desc: A woman (Heather Graham) grows suspicious of her controlling husband (Joseph Fiennes) after she discovers secrets about the women in his past.

programme.title: Problemista
programme.desc: Alejandro, an aspiring toy designer from El Salvador, tries to bring his fanciful ideas to life and chase his dream in New York City with the help of his erratic employer.

programme.title: The Girl With the Dragon Tattoo
programme.desc: A disgraced journalist (Daniel Craig) and an investigator (Rooney Mara) for a security firm probe a 40-year-old murder.

programme.title: A Bigger Splash
programme.desc: While vacationing on a Sicilian island with her boyfriend (Matthias Schoenaerts), a rock star (Tilda Swinton) receives an unexpected visit from an old flame (Ralph Fiennes) and his seductive daughter (Dakota Johnson).

programme.title: Hemingway & Gellhorn
programme.desc: Writer Ernest Hemingway (Clive Owen) begins a romance with fellow scribe Martha Gellhorn (Nicole Kidman).

programme.title: Hemingway & Gellhorn
programme.desc: Writer Ernest Hemingway (Clive Owen) begins a romance with fellow scribe Martha Gellhorn (Nicole Kidman).

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: Left behind by his crew, a stranded astronaut (Matt Damon) must find a way to survive on Mars, while NASA and a team of international scientists work tirelessly to bring him home.

programme.title: The Company You Keep
programme.desc: After a reporter (Shia LaBeouf) uncovers his real identity, a former Weather Underground activist (Robert Redford) goes on the run to track down his former lover (Julie Christie), a fellow member of his cell who never gave up the fight.

programme.title: Good Hair
programme.desc: Comic Chris Rock explores how hairstyles affect the self-esteem, activities and relationships of African-Americans.

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Professor X (James McAvoy) and Raven (Jennifer Lawrence) lead a team of young X-Men to stop the immortal mutant Apocalypse (Oscar Isaac) from destroying mankind.

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: A teen (Olivia DeJonge) and her younger brother (Ed Oxenbould) discover a shocking secret about their seemingly charming grandparents while staying at their remote Pennsylvania farm.

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he must prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

programme.title: Addicted
programme.desc: A successful businesswoman (Sharon Leal) puts her family, career and life on the line to satisfy her addiction to sex.

programme.title: Pure
programme.desc: An insecure girl grapples with fears of embracing her sexuality.

programme.title: It Comes at Night
programme.desc: After a mysterious apocalypse leaves the world with few survivors, two families are forced to share a home in an uneasy alliance to keep the outside evil at bay -- only to learn that the true horror may come from within.

programme.title: Joker
programme.desc: Isolated, bullied and disregarded by society, failed comedian Arthur Fleck begins a slow descent into madness as he transforms into the criminal mastermind known as the Joker.

programme.title: The Insurrectionist Next Door
programme.desc: Alexandra Pelosi turns her camera on people who stormed the U.S. Capitol on January 6, 2021; through interviews conducted over two years, Pelosi talks to individuals charged with crimes for their participation in the unprecedented events of the day.

programme.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
programme.desc: Supercomputer HAL 9000 guides astronauts (Keir Dullea, Gary Lockwood, William Sylvester) on a trip to find the origins of humans.

programme.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
programme.desc: Supercomputer HAL 9000 guides astronauts (Keir Dullea, Gary Lockwood, William Sylvester) on a trip to find the origins of humans.

programme.title: To Sir, With Love
programme.desc: Unable to find employment in his field, a black engineer accepts a teaching position in a tough East End London school.

programme.title: West Side Story
programme.desc: Against a backdrop of vicious gang warfare between the New Yorker Jets and the Puerto Rican Sharks, a romance develops across rival lines. 1960s update of "Romeo and Juliet", with amazing song and dance sequences.

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: An entrepreneur invites scientists (Sam Neill, Laura Dern), a mathematics theorist (Jeff Goldblum) and others to his jungle theme-park featuring dinosaurs regenerated from DNA.

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: After a tornado whisks Kansas farm girl Dorothy (Judy Garland) to a magic land, she must travel to the Emerald City for help in getting back home.

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: A police detective (Clint Eastwood) defies his superiors to capture a sniper terrorizing San Francisco.

programme.title: Unforgiven
programme.desc: An old gunslinger (Clint Eastwood), his ex-partner (Morgan Freeman) and a quick-draw kid go bounty hunting in a town called Big Whiskey.

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: A silent-film star (Gene Kelly) loves a chorus girl (Debbie Reynolds) who dubs his squeaky-voiced co-star in a 1927 Hollywood talkie.

programme.title: Casablanca
programme.desc: A cynical nightclub owner (Humphrey Bogart) protects an old flame (Ingrid Bergman) and her husband (Paul Henreid) from Nazis in Morocco.

programme.title: Lawrence of Arabia
programme.desc: Controversial British officer T.E. Lawrence (Peter O'Toole) learns the culture of Arabs (Alec Guinness, Anthony Quinn) and unites their tribes against the Turks.

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: When alien invaders lay waste to planet Earth, it's up to a select group of survivors to make a last-ditch stand.

programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people.

programme.title: Dune

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie

programme.title: House at the End of the Street
programme.desc: A divorcee (Elisabeth Shue) and her daughter (Jennifer Lawrence) learn that they have moved next door to a house in which a girl killed her parents, then disappeared, leaving a brother (Max Thieriot) as the only survivor.

programme.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
programme.desc: At the urging of the wizard Gandalf (Ian McKellen), unassuming hobbit Bilbo Baggins (Martin Freeman) joins 13 dwarves on a perilous quest to reclaim the kingdom of Erebor and gains possession of the powerful One Ring.

programme.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug (Extended Edition)
programme.desc: Bilbo (Martin Freeman) and his companions continue their journey east and brave many dangers on their way to the Lonely Mountain, culminating in an encounter with the fearsome dragon Smaug.

programme.title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
programme.desc: As the dragon Smaug rains fire on the citizens of Lake-town, Sauron sends legions of Orcs to attack the Lonely Mountain. Men, Dwarves and Elves must decide whether to unite and prevail -- or be destroyed -- and Middle Earth hangs in the balance.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
programme.desc: A chosen hobbit (Elijah Wood) and his loyal friends join a wizard (Ian McKellen), humans, a dwarf and an elf on a quest to destroy a powerful ring and defeat an evil lord.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: Now divided, members of a fellowship take different paths to destroy the ring and defeat evil Sauron and his pawns.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
programme.desc: Frodo (Elijah Wood) and Sam march toward Mount Doom to destroy the ring, while Gandalf (Ian McKellen) and warriors prepare for a final confrontation with Sauron and his allies.

programme.title: The Birth of a Nation

programme.title: Moonage Daydream
programme.desc: Con imágenes y actuaciones nunca vistas, el cineasta Brett Morgen explora el viaje creativo, espiritual y musical de David Bowie.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: La familia Addams se ve amenazada cuando una madre y su hijo, con ayuda de un abogado sin escrúpulos, conspiran para hacerse con la fortuna familiar.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Después de una tragedia, tres generaciones de la familia Deetz regresan a Winter River. Aún atormentada por Beetlejuice, la vida de Lydia da un vuelco cuando su rebelde hija adolescente, Astrid, descubre el misterioso modelo de la ciudad en el ático.

programme.title: Get Millie Black

programme.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
programme.desc: Ante la insistencia del mago Gandalf, el poco pretencioso hobbit Bilbo Bolsón se une a 13 enanos en un peligroso viaje para recuperar el reino de Erebor y gana la posesión del poderoso Anillo Único.

programme.title: Dune: Prophecy
programme.desc: Una joven Valya Harkonnen promete lealtad a la Hermandad en Wallach IX. Tres décadas después, el plan cuidadosamente elaborado por Valya se enfrenta a un desafío inesperado.

programme.title: Dune: Prophecy
programme.desc: Diez mil años antes de la ascensión de Paul Atreides, dos hermanas Harkonnen luchan contra las fuerzas que amenazan el futuro de la humanidad y establecen la legendaria secta que será conocida como Bene Gesserit.

programme.title: Dune: Prophecy
programme.desc: Antes de ser conocidas como las Bene Gesserit, una poderosa cofradía trabaja desde las sombras para guiar el universo.

programme.title: Dune: Prophecy
programme.desc: Todos los acólitos de la hermandad tienen la misma pesadilla. Tula intenta comprender sus orígenes. Antes de la gran reunión del Landsraad, Valya planea rehabilitar la Casa Harkonnen.

programme.title: Dune: Prophecy
programme.desc: Mientras Tula intenta evitar que su plan secreto sea descubierto por las otras hermanas, Desmond se pone en pie de guerra para acabar con los insurgentes.

programme.title: Dune: Prophecy
programme.desc: Mientras Tula se enfrenta a su verdadera identidad, las maniobras de Valya la arrastran a un enfrentamiento épico con Desmond.

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: Un cazador genéticamente modificado le informa a una mujer ordinaria sobre su destino como la próxima receptora de su extraordinaria herencia que podría alterar el balance del cosmos.

programme.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes

programme.title: Pretty Woman
programme.desc: Un empresario contrata a una prostituta hermosa para que sea su acompañante durante una semana de negocios en Beverly Hills.

programme.title: MaXXXine

programme.title: Parque Jurásico

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
programme.desc: Frodo Bolsón es un hobbit al que su tío Bilbo hace portador del poderoso Anillo Único, capaz de otorgar un poder ilimitado al que la posea, con la finalidad de destruirlo. Sin embargo, fuerzas malignas muy poderosas quieren arrebatárselo.

programme.title: Blue Beetle

programme.title: Knox Goes Away
programme.desc: Un asesino a sueldo al que le han diagnosticado que padece de demencia tiene la oportunidad de redimirse, antes de que la enfermedad lo trastorne por completo, salvando la vida de su hijo, con quien ya no tiene relación.

programme.title: La trampa
programme.desc: Un padre y su hija adolescente asisten a un concierto de pop, donde se dan cuenta de que están en el centro de una trama oscura y siniestra.

programme.desc: La joven Furiosa es arrebatada del Paraje Verde de las Muchas Madres por una horda de motociclistas. El señor de la guerra que dirige su grupo se enfrenta a otro tirano y, mientras tanto, Furiosa aprovecha la batalla para intentar volver a casa.

programme.title: Godzilla y Kong: El nuevo imperio
programme.desc: Godzilla y Kong se enfrentan a una amenaza colosal escondida en lo profundo del planeta, desafiando su propia existencia y la supervivencia de la raza humana.

programme.title: Civil War
programme.desc: En un futuro distópico, los EE. UU. están en guerra civil debido a un movimiento secesionista. Un equipo de periodistas acompaña a unos militares a Washington D.C. mientras las fuerzas californianas y texanas intentan conquistar la capital.

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Paul Atreides se une a Chani y a los Fremen mientras busca venganza contra los conspiradores que destruyeron a su familia. Paul se enfrenta a una elección entre el amor de su vida y el destino del universo, y debe evitar un futuro terrible.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Después de una tragedia, tres generaciones de la familia Deetz regresan a Winter River. Aún atormentada por Beetlejuice, la vida de Lydia da un vuelco cuando su rebelde hija adolescente, Astrid, descubre el misterioso modelo de la ciudad en el ático.

programme.title: Joker: Folie à Deux
programme.desc: El comediante fracasado Arthur Fleck conoce al amor de su vida, Harley Quinn, mientras está en el Hospital Estatal de Arkham. Al ser liberados, la pareja se embarca en una aventura romántica.

programme.title: Master of the Shadowless Kick: Wong Kei-Ying
programme.desc: Quiet physician Wong from southern China masters a martial art to save his mentor, protect his son and stop a corrupt governor.

programme.title: Miss Sharon Jones!
programme.desc: Filmmaker Barbara Kopple follows rhythm and blues singer Sharon Jones as she tries to hold her band together while battling pancreatic cancer.

programme.title: Kiltro
programme.desc: The leader (Marko Zaror) of a Chilean gang uses martial arts to protect a girl (Caterina Jadresic) from a vengeful thug.

programme.title: Uptown Girls
programme.desc: Forced to get a job, a freewheeling woman (Brittany Murphy) becomes a nanny to the uptight daughter (Dakota Fanning) of a New York executive.

programme.title: The Family
programme.desc: After snitching on the mob, a Mafia boss (Robert De Niro) and his family enter the Witness Protection Program and relocate to a sleepy town in France, but their insistence on resorting to their old habits places them in danger from vengeful cronies.

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: During the era of Tammany Hall's sway, a young man (Leonardo DiCaprio) vows vengeance on the vicious gangster (Daniel Day-Lewis) who killed his father.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: After his estranged father is murdered, an office drone (James McAvoy) joins secret assassins who take their orders from Fate itself.

programme.title: Deadpool
programme.desc: Armed with accelerated healing powers and a twisted sense of humor, mercenary Wade Wilson (Ryan Reynolds) adopts the alter ego Deadpool and hunts down the man (Ed Skrein) who nearly destroyed his life.

programme.title: Results
programme.desc: Personal trainers (Guy Pearce, Cobie Smulders) are charged with whipping a newly wealthy and highly unmotivated slob (Kevin Corrigan) into shape.

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: Lawmen James Payton (Ice Cube) and Ben Barber (Kevin Hart) pursue a violent drug lord (Benjamin Bratt) in Miami.

programme.title: American Honey
programme.desc: A portrait of this generation's youth living on the edge, the film follows Star (Sasha Lane), a free-spirited, teenage rebel who hits the road with a group of hard-partying, fellow misfits and discovers adventure, hope and first love.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: A New Jersey bartender (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) embarks on his first genuine relationship with a woman (Scarlett Johansson), but his constant craving for Internet porn threatens to bring things crashing down.

programme.title: I Am
programme.desc: Despite having the seemingly perfect life, Victoria still feels unhappy.

programme.title: Demolition
programme.desc: A sympathetic woman (Naomi Watts) and her young son (Judah Lewis) form a strong bond with an investment banker (Jake Gyllenhaal) whose life begins to unravel following the death of his wife (Heather Lind).

programme.title: Demolition
programme.desc: A sympathetic woman (Naomi Watts) and her young son (Judah Lewis) form a strong bond with an investment banker (Jake Gyllenhaal) whose life begins to unravel following the death of his wife (Heather Lind).

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: When the San Andreas fault triggers a magnitude 9 earthquake, a search-and-rescue helicopter pilot (Dwayne Johnson) must navigate the destruction from Los Angeles to San Francisco to bring his estranged wife (Carla Gugino) and daughter to safety.

programme.title: Snowden
programme.desc: Former CIA employee Edward Snowden (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) becomes a fugitive after leaking classified information from the National Security Agency.

programme.title: All I See Is You
programme.desc: In Bangkok, a young blind woman undergoes a cutting-edge operation that restores sight to her right eye. Able to see again, she slowly starts to realize that her newfound independence makes her husband feel jealous, threatened and insecure.

programme.title: The Trust
programme.desc: Corrupt cops working in the police department evidence room make plans to rob a vault full of drug money in the back of a convenience store.

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: Climbers (Jason Clarke, Josh Brolin, John Hawkes) from two expeditions fight for survival during a fierce blizzard on Mount Everest.

programme.title: Melancholia
programme.desc: As a planet hurtles toward a collision course with Earth, two sisters (Kirsten Dunst, Charlotte Gainsbourg) cope with the approaching doomsday in different ways.

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: In 2028, a robotics company sees a chance to bring its technology to American law enforcement by transforming a critically injured police officer (Joel Kinnaman) into a cyborg.

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: After his son is tricked into awakening a cursed Chinese emperor, Rick O'Connell (Brendan Fraser) and his family seek a way to send the megalomaniac and his 10,000 warriors back to their graves.

programme.title: Gattaca
programme.desc: An outcast (Ethan Hawke) takes part in a complicated and perilous scheme to assume the identity of a genetically engineered citizen (Jude Law).

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: After meeting the gal (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) of his dreams, a charming slacker (Michael Cera) must contend with an army of her ex-boyfriends, wanting to get rid of him.

programme.title: Tim and Eric's Billion Dollar Movie
programme.desc: Would-be filmmakers Tim and Eric squander $1 billion of the sinister Schlaaang Corp.'s money and must figure out a way to pay it back.

programme.title: The Invention of Lying
programme.desc: In a world where falsehood is unknown, a luckless writer (Ricky Gervais) develops the ability to lie and uses his newfound skill for personal gain.

programme.title: Our Idiot Brother
programme.desc: Following his release from jail, a well-meaning but dimwitted slacker (Paul Rudd) wreaks havoc with his three sisters' carefully structured lives.

programme.title: I Am
programme.desc: Hairdresser Nicola is searching for her romantic ideal, but she's stuck in a coercive relationship with her partner Adam.

programme.title: Kiltro
programme.desc: The leader (Marko Zaror) of a Chilean gang uses martial arts to protect a girl (Caterina Jadresic) from a vengeful thug.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: An outrageous British woman (Renée Zellweger) decides to take control of her life, but instead falls for two very different men (Colin Firth, Hugh Grant).

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: An attractive lawyer and Bridget's (Renée Zellweger) former boss (Hugh Grant) threaten her newfound happiness with Mark Darcy (Colin Firth).

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: Befuddled mom-to-be Bridget Jones (Renée Zellweger) must figure out which of the two men (Colin Firth, Patrick Dempsey) in her life is the father of her child.

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: A working-class single mother (Jennifer Lawrence) builds a business dynasty while dealing with her dysfunctional parents and ex-husband (Edgar Ramírez).

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
programme.desc: A recent college graduate (Anne Hathaway) lands a job working for a famous and diabolical editor (Meryl Streep) of a New York fashion magazine.

programme.title: Black Swan
programme.desc: A ballerina (Natalie Portman) begins to lose her fragile grip on reality as a sultry newcomer (Mila Kunis) threatens to usurp her position as the lead dancer in "Swan Lake.".

programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: In 1991, talented figure skater Tonya Harding becomes the first American woman to complete a triple axel during a competition. In 1994, her world comes crashing down when her ex-husband conspires to injure fellow Olympic hopeful Nancy Kerrigan.

programme.title: How I Live Now
programme.desc: As conflict in Europe escalates, an American teen (Saoirse Ronan) fights to survive in the English countryside.

programme.title: White Bird in a Blizzard
programme.desc: A teenager (Shailene Woodley) relishes her newfound freedom after her disturbed mother (Eva Green) vanishes, but the strange facts of the disappearance soon begin to haunt her.

programme.title: Down Terrace
programme.desc: The body count rises as father-and-son crime kingpins (Robert Hill, Robin Hill) try to discover the identity of a traitor in their midst.

programme.title: Hobo With a Shotgun
programme.desc: Hoping for heaven but finding an urban hell, a homeless man (Rutger Hauer) takes aim at a crime boss and the man's sadistic sons (Gregory Smith, Nick Bateman).

programme.title: The Painter and the Thief
programme.desc: Czech artist Barbora Kysilkova develops an unlikely friendship with the man who stole two of her paintings.

programme.title: The Painter and the Thief

programme.title: The Roads Not Taken
programme.desc: A man's journey through New York City takes on a hallucinatory quality as he floats through alternate lives he could have lived, while his daughter wrestles with her own path as she considers her future.

programme.title: Criminal
programme.desc: Hoping to stop a diabolical plot, the CIA implants the memories and skills of a dead agent (Ryan Reynolds) into the mind of a dangerous convict (Kevin Costner).

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: Accused of murder, a man (Justin Timberlake) must figure out how to bring down a system where time is money, enabling the wealthy to live forever, while the poor must beg for each minute of life.

programme.title: Ondine
programme.desc: Syracuse, a recovering alcoholic fisherman, catches a mystifying and beautiful girl, Ondine, in his nets. Ondine brings Syracuse great luck, but he fears she may be a mermaid.

programme.title: Love & Other Drugs
programme.desc: A pharmaceutical salesman (Jake Gyllenhaal) begins a tempestuous romance with a free-spirited Parkinson's patient (Anne Hathaway).

programme.title: Moonlight
programme.desc: A look at three defining chapters in the life of Chiron, a young black man growing up in Miami. His epic journey to manhood is guided by the kindness, support and love of the community that helps raise him.

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: With his job at stake, a tech-savvy employee (Liam Hemsworth) has to infiltrate a competitor's company and steal trade secrets for his ruthless boss (Gary Oldman).

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: Scientists at a remote, top-secret facility find themselves in a dangerous lockdown with an unpredictable and violent bioengineered child (Anya Taylor-Joy).

programme.title: Beowulf
programme.desc: After destroying the demon Grendel, a mighty warrior (Ray Winstone) faces an even-more-potent enemy in the form of its seductive, vengeful mother (Angelina Jolie).

programme.title: The Kill Team
programme.desc: When a young U.S. soldier in Afghanistan witnesses other recruits killing civilians under the direction of a sadistic sergeant, he begins to fear that the men he's serving with might be the ones to kill him.

programme.title: A Private War
programme.desc: Celebrated war correspondent Marie Colvin charges into danger, constantly testing the limits between bravery and bravado.

programme.title: The Glass Castle
programme.desc: Based on a memoir, four children struggle to grow up in a rambling, poverty-stricken, wildly unconventional environment overseen by their dysfunctional yet uniquely loving parents.

programme.desc: Jason Bourne (Matt Damon) continues his international quest to uncover his true identity while staying one step ahead of those who want to kill him.

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
